top-hero.text: Fun high-quality hosiery from Northern Europe

main-services.subheader: We manufacture socks, tights and all other kinds of legwear:

about-us.text: Weri Spezials is a Latvian-German company located in Riga, operating since 1994. Following centuries-old traditions, Weri Spezials produces durable and ergonomic socks and tights for people of every age. We stick to eco-friendly manufactory standards, because we care about the health of our customers and the environment.
